[data-task-id='1'].title: Task color
[data-task-id='1'].content: Chose one of 17 available colors by setting `eventColor` on each task

[data-task-id='7'].title: Task color editors
[data-task-id='7'].content: Open context menu or double-tap to open task editor. Here you can pick a color for each task

[data-task-id='16'].title: Custom CSS colors
[data-task-id='16'].content: You can use any CSS color value. Simply set the `eventColor` field on each task to whatever you want
